com.dotmarketing.business.web

Interface LanguageWebAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LanguageWebAPIImpl

    public interface LanguageWebAPI
    Specialized LanguageAPI created to manage language cache and language struts cache in webdav.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Oswaldo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkSessionLocale(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest)
      Checks and correctly sets in session the user current selected language and locale setting After invoking this method the following objects get set in session and request object with the correct values: com.dotmarketing.util.WebKeys.HTMLPAGE_LANGUAGE - With the language id com.dotmarketing.util.WebKeys.LOCALE - With the user locale
      void clearCache()
      Clear the language cache and struts cache
      Language getLanguage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Checks the session and gets the language for the user
